results.description:
Who we are? 

The West NY | Hoboken | Social Group 20s & 30s is a fun and active social group that creates opportunities through social events to make friends and build a social network. Each social event offers opportunity for good laughs, meaningful connections, great fun, and overall memorable times. The group provides the ideal solution to fulfill your social life needs. We are a very diverse group of people with various backgrounds and nationalities. 

Where are we? 

While this group originated in West New York, NJ we host events throughout the Tri-state area and New York City. Feel free to peruse our past Meetups for the different venues. Whatever your choice of venue may be, the West NY | Hoboken | Social Group 20s & 30s can make it happen! 

What do we do? 

We regularly organize exciting and fun events! We offer a wide variety of event themes. The events can range in size from large gatherings at nightclubs or popular attraction sites to smaller and more intimate places where it is easier interact and socialize on a personal level. 

Our mission: 

We work hard to create a welcoming and friendly atmosphere where members feel comfortable to connect and relate with one another. We thrive on the principle that new members are treated as equally as old members. We take pride in promoting a environment of inclusivity, and not exclusivity. 

We value our members 

We encourage members to provide feedback on the general experience with the group. Member's input is extremely important to our success as a social Meetup group. Your ideas and insights help the group create more interesting and exciting events. 

** We kindly request that you provide a valid profile picture that clearly shows your face and answer the introductory questions as this will help us know a little bit about you. We appreciate your cooperation in this matter :) ** 

Come join us and let the fun begin!!!!

results.description:
What if your life were more joyful… wonderful… meaningful... and successful? It can be.

At the same time you can help our world be more beautiful and sustainable? You can.

How?
I'll let you in on a "new" secret. It "hides" in plain sight:

When we find it enjoyable to change our lives and world, it happens more quickly and fully.

In this new (! :-) Meetup we'll share ideas… enjoy inspiring and fun cultural activities… build friendships… and help create a diverse range of awesome…

Were exploring how we can do this in our personal lives, our relationships, our communities, for nature, our spiritual lives and more!

Of course, change isn't always simple. We're finding and using ways to make it easier – and better!

You
If you're already involved in change, great! If you're not – or if you sometimes find it difficult, frustrating or boring – this group is also for you!

Me
I've been involved in change all my adult life. I've done some valuable things and I'd like to do even more. With you.

I look forward to meeting you!

-Bill

"Become friends with people who aren't your age. Hang out with people who first language is not your own. Get to know someone who doesn't come your social class. This is how you see the world. This is how you grow."

NO SHOW POLICY: 1. If you RSVP "yes" to an event and do not attend, you are a "no show" 2. If you are a "no show" to three events, you will be removed from the group. We understand emergencies do happen, but events take time and a lot of effort to plan so please be mindful and update your RSVP's.

This is a non-denominational Adult Single God fearing Christians. Members are ages 35 to 75 Singles and Single-Agains for whatever reasons. We believe in the power of prayer. We practice an 'out of the box' approach to issues of delayed marriages, difficult relationships, broken dreams, loneliness, disappointments and other issues faced by the Christian Singles and Single Agains. 

We are educated, single and professionals in various fields. We love to get together for affordable activities in our neighborhood, having breakfast meetings at weekends and public holidays, having picnics, organizing praise dances, going to movies and sharing the word of God. We are a bunch of fun loving people who enjoy an enabling environment to meet or get introduced to Christians of like minds. 

 We  attend events in each other's churches and social occasions. 

We believe that our God is a God of New Beginning and of Second Chance. Thus we know that as you trust Him, you would find that "special person" along the way.  

We are here to support one another because if we don't who else is there to support us but God. 99% of churches have nothing on their menu for our category. When they discuss marriage issues, the adult single Agains are written off, spoken of in a derogatory, no-go- area undertones. But guess what, we will rather believe in the Lord  who says that He will do a new thing...Joel 2: 25. He said that his thought towards us is to give us hope and a future. Jeremiah 29:11.

Romans 8:31 says "What, then, shall we say in response to these things? If God is for us, who can be against us?"

Come on, come out, lets enjoy abundant life in our Lord Jesus Christ. John 10:10.

Welcome!
results.name: NY PRACTICING CHRISTIAN- SINGLES & SINGLE AGAINS 35-75 YRS

topics.name: How to Declutter Your Home and Life

results.description:
MEETUP GOLDEN RULES

#1 To Join US: We need you to have a CURRENT profile picture of YOURSELF, a picture of an animal, object, background scenery or no picture will not be approved.

#2 No Show Policy: If you rsvp YES to an event, please honor that YES rsvp by actually showing up. If you are unable to make it to a scheduled event, thus keeping you from joining us, please be considerate to your event host and fellow members by updating your rsvp at least 1 day before the event is scheduled to start. Please remember that this group has a no-show/same day cancel policy - 3 strikes and you're out of the group!


About Us

"Minimalism is not the lack of something, it is the perfect amount of something" Calling all minimalists and simplicity enthusiasts in New York. Let's help each other to make space and time to create the life we want to live by decluttering, curating, and editing your life to a life that you would be proud of. (Plus, a life that is more sustainable & environmentally friendly via minimalism) This group is for support, inspiration, and motivation!

Here people who deal with issues such as minimalist lifestyle, sustainability and reduced consumption meet. The 5 Rs: Refuse, Reduce, Reuse, Repair, Recycle are an important part of the way of thinking in everyday life.

This meetup group in New York City will host meetings in all 5 boroughs for everyone who wants to discover, learn more or share their experiences with minimalism. Minimalism is a lifestyle that helps people question what adds value to their lives. By clearing the clutter from life's path, we can all make room for the most important aspects of life: health, relationships, passion, growth, and contribution. There are many flavors of minimalism: a twenty-year-old single guy's minimalist lifestyle looks different from a forty-five-year-old mother's minimalist life. Even though everyone embraces minimalism differently, each path leads to the same place: a more purposeful and deliberate life.

If this speaks to you, join in the upcoming conversations! You can attend by yourself or bring a friend/partner!

An introduction to minimalism starts here:
http://www.theminimalists.com/
http://theminimalists.com/podcast
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iKhQ75DfD2k

https://www.facebook.com/NewYorkCityMinimalismGroup/

https://www.facebook.com/groups/464826070394574/


In this group, it is not about to reach a consensus or to solve the problems of the world. Rather, an exchange of interested and committed people with different motivations and lifestyles.
results.name: New York City Minimalism Group

All welcome.

*Frans Johansson’s The Medici Effect shows how breakthrough ideas most often occur when we bring concepts from one field into a new, unfamiliar territory, and offers examples how we can turn the ideas we discover into path-breaking innovations.

"When you bring together diverse teams and perspectives, you have the ability to create an exponential increase in ideas....Diverse teams create far more ideas than homogenous teams" -Frans Johansson

results.description:
This is a group for any Blab.im, Periscope, MeVee, Facebook Live, Go Live With, Google Hangouts Live, MeerKat or other people interested in learning and doing livestream video broadcasts and public speaking.  YouTube broadcasters also welcome!

As an active Blab broadcaster, I recognize the importance of also meeting people in person.  I started this group to inspire other live streamers around the world to meet in person, accelerate business relationships, share best practices with each other, and grow the global community of live streamers.  

It is also important for us to meet in person to build closer business relationships, make connections, and help the global community develop and adopt best practices to limit or help eliminate negative experiences in the global live streaming video world, such as spam, trolls, fraud and other socially unacceptable and/or criminal behavior.

One of the best ways to differentiate yourself in business is through public speaking and broadcasting including Blab.im, Periscope, Facebook Livestream, MeVee, Meerkat, GoLiveWith and Snapchat, as well as new and emerging platforms.  

All levels of public speaking and live streaming video are welcome! You can expect to network with other businesses, speakers and social media enthusiasts while learning new tricks and tips of the trade. No matter what your skill, this group is meant to help you grow your skills and business using live streaming video.

This is already a game changer in social media and online business, so be sure to get involved while it is still early in the game.  It is easier than ever to connect with people through video broadcasting.  

You can bring your message to the world, and help others in the process.  Come meet like minded people and be part of a movement that is changing the world for the better!

results.description:
THE GROUP IS FULL! We are currently not accepting new members. The group will open again as spaces become available... 

Socially awkward nerdy, dorky, quirky black women ages 25-35 (age is completely flexible) If you have ever heard anything along these lines… “Too black to be nerdy, too nerdy to be black” or “Why do you sound white” this is probably the group for you! If not, this still may be the group for you! The point of this group is to cultivate real friendships and form a safe place where you can be yourself, vent if necessary, and have fun where everyone understands your social anxiety. Let’s squash the stereotype that women and/or black women can’t be friends. Life is hectic and sometimes you need to get away and the tri-state area is full of fun and interesting people and things to do, so let come together. You will be required to attend at least one event within the first two months of joining or you will be removed from the group. I understand life gets hectic and plans sometimes must be canceled but the point is to show up for each other. With that being said there will be an opportunity to join the group again if a spot opens. In this group we’ll hang out and just be cool. Explore the city and all its surroundings. Museum trips, amusement parks, concerts, hikes, the theater, shopping, dancing (class or the club), game night or even those cool random events that pop up in the city and you seem to never have anyone to go with. The sky is the limit! Everyone from the tri-state area is welcome not just New Yorkers!

results.description:
We are a competitive Underwater Rugby (UWR) team and we invite you to join us for an exciting practice! 

Underwater what? Underwater rugby is probably the most exciting activity you may have ever done. The only 3D sport (apart from Harry Potter’s Quidditch), great endurance, fast, strategic, and above all: extreme fun! Imagine a 13ft-deep pool, 2 baskets on the bottom of each side. Two teams, equipped with fins, mask&snorkel, and a salt-water filled ball. We hold our breath when playing at 3, 5, 13 feet below the surface and pass the ball standing on our heads, swimming sideways and swirling around. Yes, we can tackle the person who carries the ball. But no, no one ever drowned in the 60 years the sport has been around. Our mixed teams welcome girlz and boyz. 

We have all the equipment you need if you want to try - so just send us a quick line and new experiences await - we promise!

Check out our Facebook site www.facebook.com/NJ.UWH.UWR/
results.name: NJ Hammerheads Underwater Rugby, Newark

results.description:
Calling All Adventurous Foodies,

Let’s travel the world using our taste buds!

One of the most wonderful things about New York City is its melting pot of ethnicities and its incredible ethnic diversity identity. You can literally travel around the world in NY without even getting on a plane. Exploring different ethnic neighborhoods and sampling their delicious ethnic dishes is a must, whether you live in NYC or are just visiting. Eating in an ethnic restaurant is about more than just the food, it’s a cultural experience that gives you a literal taste of life in another land.

OUR OBJECTIVES: This group is specifically meant for those who enjoy exploring the great diversity of ethnic cuisines from all around the world in a fun, relaxed atmosphere in the company of other like-minded adventurous foodies right here in the NYC and surrounding vicinities. Together we will eat our way through a cornucopia of exotic cuisines representing all corners of the globe.

OUR MEETUPS: Good food is meant to be shared. At each Meetup, we will dine FAMILY-STYLE, NO EXCEPTIONS! Attendees will have a say in the selection of a variety of dishes. Final food bill, together with tax and tips will be shared among the attendees. Any drinks are separate and are the responsibility of the drinkers. Number of attendees to our events will be kept at a small number (no more than 12) to allow everyone to get to know each other.

MEETUP FEE: To help defray the cost of paying Meetup HQ to keep the site up and running, a $1.00 Meetup fee will be collected at randomly selected events.

IMPORTANT GROUP RULES: A successful group is not about how many members there are in the group. It is about the quality of members in the group! We would rather have a small group of "quality members" than a huge group of "joiners" and “lurkers” who never show up to any event.

 With that said:

(1) To join the group, you must have a recognizable face picture; and

(2) If you are a general lurker who join the group but not participate in any event, please don’t bother to join.

General rsvp policy:

• Yes rsvps ONLY if you are certain you can attend an event.  There is no need to rsvp NO if not attending or if event does not interest you. 

• We will enforce a strict ANTI-FLAKE POLICY - Just one (1) no-show or last minute (less than 24 hours) cancel will get you booted out of the group.

• If you are an RSVP-aholic, that is, you rsvp to every single event and then bail out last minute, you don't belong in this group!
results.name: EthNYC Eats

results.description:
"MBC is an edged-weapon system specifically designed to meet the needs of today’s concerned citizen and armed professional. Based on Michael Janich’s extensive analysis of the Filipino martial arts and many other systems, MBC takes combat-proven tactics and adapts them to modern tools, threats, and legal concerns. The result is a practical, easy-to-learn system that is ideally suited to modern self-defense. Like all real self-defense, MBC tactics focus on 'stopping power' - the ability to immediately and decisively stop an assailant from continuing his attack. To this end, MBC emphasizes an in-depth understanding of human physiology and the most effective methods of targeting key structures with small, legal-to-carry knives."...Michael Janich

MBC isn't knife fighting or knife dueling.  MBC is utilizing the knife to defend against X.  MBC isn't specifically a Filipino martial art; MBC is a bladed combative system.  MBC is to Filipino martial arts as Kelly Mc'Cann's Combatives are to Karate (any traditional martial art). 

Fees: 

Trial Lesson (1st class) - FREE
$15/per class (roughly a 2 hour training session)

Note: Must be 18+ yrs old. 

***Due to the structure and nature of the group it is very important, for those serious minded individuals, to be active and remain active with us; excessive inactivity will result in one's removal from the group. ***
results.name: NNJ Martial Blade Concepts Study Group

results.description:
This workshop is for the yoga teacher and creative professional looking to integrate a yogic approach into their professional life with practical skills for vocal production and public speaking from a body oriented perspective.  

This two and a half hour intensive will begin with a brief asana practice, led by New Vibe Yoga founder, Alex Schatzberg. The asana will be directly followed by a vocal practice, led by Energizeyourvoice.net founder, Minna Taylor - integrating breath, body, and vibration - with the singular goal of developing dynamic, effortless resonance.

The final portion of the workshop will be public speaking focused. There will be an emphasis on play, developing impulsive responsiveness, practical techniques for effective public speaking, and individual evaluation with personalized feedback. 

You will leave with a new appreciation for how your asana informs your communication and a deeper understanding of how your voice functions in your body.  You will feel empowered to communicate with confidence in any public speaking scenario.
results.name: Voice and Public Speaking for the Yoga Minded Professional

results.description:
DOWNTOWN PICKUP SOCCER

Started by a group of soccer fanatics who love to play the Beautiful Game and wanted to create a meetup for individuals of all levels. 

Our Mission: Play safe, get your workout on & HAVE FUN!!

The Lowdown: 

1. Play safe,  games are 7v7 including goalie, NO slide tackles, excessive aggression will NOT be tolerated (the precinct is across the street...LOL!!). 

2. Cleats are permitted, and Sneakers or Turf Shoes are acceptable as well. We play for an hour with a break in the middle. If no volunteered goal keeper, players will rotate the position. We play with corner kicks and throw-ins. Also, everyone should bring a Blue T-Shirt and a White T-Shirt

3. Pitch Location: Between Baxter & Mulberry St. with additional entrance on Worth & Bayard St. 

4. Nearest train stations: Brooklyn Bridge (4, 5 & 6), Canal Street (A, B, C, Q, R, N & 6), Chambers Street (J and Z). Citibike station is available right next to the field on Worth Street. 

5. HAVE FUN!

See you Downtown!

PLEASE READ THESE TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF USE CAREFULLY.
BY JOINING THIS GROUP, YOU AGREE TO THESE TERMS AND CONDITIONS.

JOINING AND SIGNING UP FOR DOWNTOWN PICKUP SOCCER ACTIVITIES AGREEMENT: 

I certify that I am 18 years of age or older and that I have no known medical or other conditions that could interfere with my participation in DOWNTOWN PICKUP SOCCER activities. I also understand and accept that the practice of soccer, both indoor and outdoor, involves certain risks of physical injury. Therefore I, individually, hereby release and discharge, DOWNTOWN PICKUP SOCCER Organizers and Co-organizers from any and all claims, actions, damages, losses, liabilities, costs and expenses of any kind whatsoever, including but not limited to any claims of negligence, arising out of, resulting from, by reason of, or in connection with my participation in any of DOWNTOWN PICKUP SOCCER programs or activities.

DOWNTOWN PICKUP SOCCER Organizer and its Co-Organizers reserve the right to take and utilize photographs, video, or any type of recording of participating person while engaged in our or associated activities. I consent to DOWNTOWN PICKUP SOCCER use the photograph, video, or recording of me, for advertising, promotional, or related purposes, and waive all rights to compensation and other rights which may arise as a result.

The Downtown Pickup Soccer Team

results.description:
Goal: We'd like to develop some sort of consistent, stable group of like minded musicians that work together well and meet on a regular basis.  It can be for ourselves only or maybe also performing, if the opportunity arose and there was interest.

This is not a good group for beginners - not that we have anything against them. But we're looking for more than just plodding through 6 standard "slow blues" in 6 different keys and another 6 standard "shuffle blues" in the other 6, with random solos, etc. You should be familiar and comfortable with your instrument and the common traditional blues forms and riffs, and be able to build and expand on them.

We like to focus on interesting and perhaps original interpretations of a lot of 'one off' sorts of blues and RnB material, verging into jazz, rock, pop and fusion jazz, etc. Of course there will be enough raunchy 1/4/5's, but we'll start by trying to nail the particular factors - certain riffs, rhythms and nuances - that distinguish one from the other and characterize certain artists and styles, and/or our own style, should we be able to develop one. That said, we hope the music will be "open" as well - fluid and loose, played with confidence and an adventurous spirit - both good licks and mistakes included. Call it 'the jazz spirit" - not a "cover band" by any means and we're not really song-based at all - songs generally only provide a starting point for what we like to do. That's how we learn and grow as musicians.

Looking for a drummer, a couple of guitarists who know how to play in an ensemble and not just wax into long solos, vocalists, keys, a good electric harp player. Brass and reeds that can fit into the format are also more than welcome. I am in Brooklyn, so musicians in NYC area with easy access to a venue in Manhattan or Brooklyn would be most appropriate.  

I've been playing bass for many years (on and off with varying degrees of dedication) - some gigs, a lot of jamming and messing around, etc. etc.  At the moment I own six basses, mostly short scale axes, although this count tends to vary. I love playing electric blues, funk, RnB and some light jazz, fusion jazz and acid rock. I am not a sight reader, but I do know my scales and chords well enough and my chops are respectable, including first position in many keys. I practice regularly.  

A number of venues where I used to jam have closed or changed their orientation. So I am dying to get together with some like minded musicians (you don't have to be a boomer) to put something together. 

Favorites include Muddy, Butterfield, Albert King, Wilson Pickett, Luther Allison, Fabulous TBirds, William Clarke, some Dylan and what Horace Silver I'm able to negotiate. I also have a decent number of original progressions that would be probably characterized as fusion or latin flavored blues, and of course anybody else's original material that fits our parameters is welcome. (I'm a big fan of Latin rhythms. Although I'm not well acquainted with the structure and harmonies of most Latin music, I'd love to learn about it. )

Let's Wail!

MNG
results.name: Boomers Blues Summit

results.description:
Waterwomen and Watermen -- I Mua!

Does the open ocean call you? The wind and salty sea? How about joining a community of like-minded water enthusiasts who embrace the spirit of aloha?

The East Coast Outrigger Racing Association (ECORA) was founded in 1997 to establish Polynesian outrigger canoe paddling and racing on the east coast of mainland U.S.A. and Canada. Today there are more than thirty outrigger canoe clubs all up and down the east coast. ECORA thrives in nearly every coastal state from Maine to Florida, Quebec and Ontario. We welcome interested paddlers to join an existing club or form a new one. 

Outrigger canoe paddling builds on the culture and tradition that span centuries prior to the recorded history of Hawai'i and Polynesia. The indigenous sport survived the oppression of being outlawed by foreign settlers and pushed aside by waves of modernization. In Hawai'i, King David Kalakaua, a Hawaiian monarch, is credited for catalyzing Hawaiian cultural resurgence during the late 19th century. He restored outrigger canoe racing as a legal sport for the Hawaiian people. Around the world, outrigger canoe paddling and racing continues to grow. 

The international presence of outrigger canoes is marked by key stronghold races that draw the world's best competitors. ECORA members are prominent components and contributors to the international competitive circuit.

For more information about ECORA, go to www.eastcoastoutrigger.com. 

For those new to this meetup site, read the announcement of this site.
results.name: East Coast Outrigger Racing Association

results.description:
The Inner Engineering Meetup group offers free meditation classes, yoga programs, public events, and social gatherings where we can come together to practice, learn more, relax and have fun! 

We look forward to meeting you, soon! 

--------------

"If life were to come with a manual, this in my opinion would be it! If we all applied the Inner Engineering technology, our world would instantly transform to exist from a foundation of peace, joy, and compassion for all beings."  -Evita Ochel   

For all of the strides we have made in science and technology with standards of living unimaginable a century ago, most human beings still remain in search of wholeness and purpose in their lives.  Inner Engineering is scientifically-structured to offer powerful processes from the ancient tradition of yoga to transcend the limitations of who you are and bring you to higher levels of consciousness.  Inner Engineering was designed by Sadhguru, a yogi, visionary, and one the foremost authorities on yoga as a powerful tool to create your life the way you want it.  

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hUeyqLTsGJs

Sadhguru & Deepak Chopra— Creating Inner Peace, Joy and Fulfillment in a Hectic Modern World 

"The word 'yoga' means union, that means you experience the entire universe as yourself...by working with the body, by working with the mind, by working with your emotion and energy, you can setup a step-by- step system within yourself where your energies are kept at such a level of exuberance that your sensory body is as large as the universe...Once you experience everybody around you as yourself... your goodness is a consequence, not an effort."

https://youtu.be/WMhJgdpj1d0

About Sadhguru—Sadhguru is a realized yogi and mystic – a man whose passion spills into everything he encounters. With a keen mind, balanced by a heart that knows no boundary, his presence and powerful yoga programs create an extraordinary opportunity to break through limitations into one’s natural state of freedom, love and joy. 

Sadhguru has a unique ability to make the ancient science of yoga relevant to contemporary minds. Sadhguru serves as a bridge to the deeper dimensions of life. His approach does not ascribe to any belief system, but offers methods for self-transformation that are both proven and powerful.

An author, poet and internationally renowned speaker, Sadhguru’s wit and piercing logic provoke and broaden our thoughts and perception of the meaning of life, the very purpose of life. Sadhguru has been an influential voice at major global forums including the UN, MIT, TED, and the World Economic Forum.

Sadhguru established Isha Foundation, a non-profit organization supported by over two million volunteers worldwide. From powerful yoga programs and meditation practices to large-scale humanitarian projects, the foundation’s activities are designed to create an inclusive culture and establish global harmony, earning a special consultative status with the United Nations.

------------------ 

Isha Kriya Guided Meditation—Jump Right In... Learn to Meditate NOW! 

These 1-hour guided meditation sessions offer a simple, but powerful kriya practice that aligns your mind, body, and inner-energies to elevate your conscious awareness and easily and naturally achieve a state of deep meditation. Once you are meditative on a daily basis, your experience of the life within you and the world around you becomes much richer. Daily meditation makes your life stress-free, effortless and joyful! 

You can easily learn this 12-to-18 minute Isha Kriya process in a convenient, online meditation class, or through a live, free meditation class near you.  Our online formats include our streaming guided meditation video, the Isha Kriya meditation app (for iphone & android devices), and weekly webinars hosted by trained teachers who can answer your questions about the practice.  Local meditation sessions are hosted regularly to enhance and deepen the experience with the group. 

Benefits of regular Isha Kriya meditation practice include improving health, energy and vitality; enhancing mental focus, memory and clarity; reducing stress and establishing a deep sense of peace and inner balance. 

Isha Kriya is a simple, gentle guided meditation that can be done seated cross-legged on the floor or sitting in a chair. No previous experience with yoga or meditation  is necessary.

https://youtu.be/q8NYZdYd5GQ

Take a  Deeper Step with Inner Engineering: Create a Life of Total Wellbeing—

“Inner Engineering is neither a religion, nor a philosophy or dogma. It is a technology for wellbeing. One does not have to believe or disbelieve--just have to learn to use...  Technology will produce results irrespective of who you are.” –Sadhguru  

Inner Engineering is a 7-session online course that gives you the opportunity to intellectually explore the ABC’s of life using methods that are the distilled essence of yogic sciences. The course imparts practical wisdom to manage your body, mind, emotions, and the fundamental life energy within. 

Program components include:

• Enlightening interactive sessions

• Guided meditations

• Asanas, simple yoga postures.

• Shambhavi Mahamudra, a powerful , 21-minute inner-energy technique that brings your entire system into alignment so that your body, mind, emotions and energies function in harmony.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=ooFAmT4n89Y

**Live Reviews from Inner Engineering Participants ** 

------------------

A Serene Mountain Getaway to Learn Classical Yoga:  Relax and rejuvenate at the Isha yoga retreat—

The Isha Institute of Inner-sciences is a breathtaking mountain retreat for stress relief, rejuvenation, and complete inner well-being. The yoga retreat offers the ancient science in its purest form, through experiential classical yoga, meditation classes, and powerfully energized meditation spaces such as the Adi Yogi: The Abode of Yoga.  

The Isha Institute of Inner-sciences is a world-class yoga center offering classical yoga and meditation classes from beginner to advanced levels. Guests journey from around the globe to visit this unique destination to relax, reflect, and reconnect with nature in this tranquil oasis nestled in Tennessee’s spectacular Upper Cumberland. 

https://youtu.be/RpXEcB5uhZc

Drop-by for a Day Visit

The Isha retreat center offers campus tours daily that include light hikes to one of many beautiful bluff vistas or waterfalls and a visit inside Mahima, the largest yoga and meditation hall in the western hemisphere! Several free yoga classes and guided meditation sessions are available each day.  Inquire with the main office for details.

Hiking and Mountain Biking on Pristine Forested Trails

The Isha retreat center also offers myriad opportunities for hiking and mountain biking on forested trails winding throughout nearly 1400 acres. The center's five miles of mountain biking trails have been professionally classified from beginner to intermediate skill levels, with steep climbs, water features, and tight switchbacks on the more challenging portions. The trails are part of an expanding network of over 15 miles of hiking and biking trails featuring beautiful waterfalls, a meandering spring-fed creek, and breathtaking bluff overlooks.

Relaxation & Wellness Retreats

Overnight stays include the option of private studio accommodations, delicious vegetarian buffet, and beginner-level yoga classes of the visitor`s choice, such as the 'yoga of sound', yoga for strengthening the joints, and yoga for purifying life energies.  Extended retreat packages feature Ayurvedic rejuvenation consultations and therapies; guided hikes and adventure outings to nearby caves, rivers and falls; free access to over 5 miles of mountain biking trails, and even cooking classes to bring home some of your favorite vegetarian delights!  Learn how to mix the pungent, tangy spices of the East, culture farm-fresh milk into yogurt, roll vegetarian sushi, or bake homemade sourdough bread in the Isha center's popular, international kitchen.

For over 30 years, Isha programs have offered the immense benefits of classical yoga and meditation to over 7 million people around the globe. For further details on the Isha yoga retreat center, the Isha Institute of Inner-sciences, and full details on the yoga and meditation programs offered, visit IshaUSA.org.

Visit us online...

IshaUSA Blog: http://www.ishafoundation.org/us/blog/ 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/InnerEngineering  ; https://www.facebook.com/IshaUSA/ 
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/IshaUSA 
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/IshaInnerEngineering
results.name: Inner Engineering New Jersey (Isha Yoga& Meditation Classes)

results.description:
Do you want a kick-ass army of allies that have your back, encourage you to live big, and are there to help you create, mastermind and bring into the world what you know is possible...and have fun in the process?

The Ollin Alliance (pronounced “ALL-in”) is a community of passionate explorers and leaders of all types that want to learn and practice the advanced skills of personal, collaborative and collective mastery in order to create a truly emergent leading-edge community.

Wanting to collaborate and contribute to the common good is awesome! However it’s not enough. There is the need for a fundamental shift in the way we collaborate and create together.

We use the analogy of shifting from an “Orchestra” hierarchy to a “Jazz Improv” collaboration….where everyone shares there unique gifts and what gets created is even greater than any one person could imagine.  However, most of us have not been taught how to collaborate, or how to work with larger dynamics of culture and community.

In order to make that shift, we need individually and collectively...expanded skills, frameworks and perspectives. We need a forum to learn, practice and experiment.  We hope to offer that and more through The Ollin Alliance.

Do you want to...

- Learn & Practice Evolving Edge Skills
- Go Beyond Traditional Networking
- Get Your Work Out in the World & Have a Positive Impact
- Collaborate & Create Collective Ventures that Benefit the World

results.description:
Planning on pitching to investors? Want brutally honest Feedback? 


Pitch Practice Forum goal is to give startup founders as much feedback as they can get about their pitch and business idea. Each attendee will use a Web app to make a Hypothetical Investment decision in the startup and write feedback about the pitch. At the end of the pitch, each startup will be drilled with 15 mins of questions from the audience. Our goal here is to give the founders a fresh perspective and new set of eyes on their business.


Future Plan: People make vastly different investment decisions when actual money is at stake, even if the value in question is very small. We are considering charging the attendees a higher fee of which, half will be given back to them to invest in the startup that they just heard pitching (no equity involved). At the end of the pitch event, the money invested by the attendees will be given to the startup founders. 

eg: If the we charge you $10 to attend the meetup we will give you back $5 which you can invest. We think such a system will simulate a real-world investment decision as closely as possible.
results.name: Pitch Practice Forum

results.description:
This group is for members who have decided that its time to make a change, to become healthier and happier individuals. I want to motivate myself and keep myself accountable by creating this group and my online group. I am also a Beach Body coach, so I don't just want to help myself but also all my members. So join now if you are tired of the ups and downs of not attaining your goals.

To become a member you need three main things: 1. be a Lucille Roberts gym member at the Valley Stream location and 2. be ready to commit to this change 3. stay linked online to our FB page, for tips, motivation, post our progress, vent and etc.  As the season warms up and even before then we will be alternating working out at the gym and walking in Alley Pond Park.   Calories burn three times as much during the cold, we will discuss preparation for attempting to do so.


Disclaimer: all participation in both outdoors or indoor work outs are at your own risk.  You are responsible for taking your time and not over exerting yourself where you can suffer injuries.  If you have health concerns seek medical advice before joining and participating in this group.  Wear protective clothing, or braces if need be to ensure safety.  We will begin very slow, because I myself have knee issues, with time we will increase activity.

results.description:
Does GE Predix have the potential to become the engine behind most successful industrial products of the next 10-20 years? Absolutely! 

A much better question is how, and in what new ways, can we: 

a) do better things with the massive amounts of data coming out of all sorts of machines 

b) build industrial IoT applications and predictive APIs at 10x the speed at 1/10 the cost 

Why? 

Because with Predix we can. 

Founders of this group believe that Predix will help conceive, deliver and scale some of the most important industrial advances of the next 10-20 years. 

So.... why don't we standardize and democratize the field with and around Predix, and help change the world!? 

What. 

We are a local micro community of those interested in advancing their knowledge of Predix, its use cases and applications. 

How. 

Join our group for a regular dose of human interaction, conversations, smiles, food and drinks on all things Predix: 

∙ How-To’s 

∙ Review of Predix Services 

∙ Do’s and Don’ts 

∙ Best Practices in User Experience 

∙ Application Templates

∙ Building predictive APIs 

∙ Security on the edge, in the cloud, and in transit 

We will learn how others solve some of the hard problems that exist in the world of machines around us, and how others make predictive APIs and applications using Predix. 

Join the movement. Let’s change the world. Because with Predix we can.
results.name: GE Predix NYC (Industrial Internet)

View our talks on our Youtube channel on https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgfp3J4CsyF2jNoanDzYYlQ This group exists as a community platform to offer support to those who feel a spiritual calling or awakening arising from our deeper connection to nature, God as each of us perceives God to be, one another and ourselves. We do not condone or support illegal activities, and we encourage the safe and correct usage of all medicinal and/or ornamental plants and do not accept responsibility for incorrect or reckless usage of any plants in any way. results.description:
Hey guys!
Have you ever missed your favorite band's show just because you didn't have someone to go to the show with? Don't you wish you can meet more people with the same taste of bands that you listen to? If you answered yes to both questions, then this meetup is for you!

My name is Wilfredo Betance Jr, and I've been going to metalcore shows throughout the past 9 years. I honestly want to meet more people that like my kind of music and that like to rock out at shows! The only time I'm around people that like my kind of music is when I go to shows, but everyone is usually with their group of friends and don't want to mingle! (weirdos lol). I thought to myself, "if I'm having these thoughts, maybe there are others like me who feel the same way!" The purpose of this group is create a fan-base group between us metalcore/post-hardcore fans in the NJ/NYC area to hang out and go to shows!

------Questions you may have regarding the meetup group------

1.What do you mean by metalcore/post hardcore shows?

I know people get the genres titles mixed up. To reduce any confusion, I'm going to list some of the bands I listen to so you guys have an idea of the type of shows this meetup is meant for.

A Day To Remember
Our Last Night
Bullet for My Valentine
Slipknot
Asking Alexandra
Memphis May Fire
Issues
I See Stars
Crown the Empire
Black Veil Brides
Escape The Fate
Suicide Silence
Rise Against
Motionless in White
Palisades
The Amity Affliction
Silvertien
Blessthefall
Sleeping with sirens
Pierce the veil
Falling in Reverse
The Word Alive
Bring Me The Horizon
We Came as Romans
Emmure
Chunk! No, Captain Chuck!

Alright, I can go on forever with this list! Lol. I hope this gives you guys an idea of type of shows this meetup is meant for.

2. How will this meetup operate?
I'm going to post a list of shows that I'll be attending, and I'm going to list restaurants around the show's venue where we can meet up and hang before the show!

If you guys have any shows that you are attending and what to have it announced in the group, go ahead and announce it!

--------Some ground Rules-------

1. This isn't an advertisement platform. This is a platform for us like-minded people, with similar taste of music, to get to know one another and attend shows together!

2. Don't make fun at others for listening to a particular band. Keep your comments and opinions to yourself.

The only type of advertising that's allowed
1. If you are in a local band, or you have close friends that are in a local band and want to spread the word of the band's show, message me, and we'll take it from there.
---------------------------------------------------------------
I have pretty much explained myself with the purpose of this meetup! Questions, thoughts, and suggestions regarding the meetup? Message me!
results.name: NJ/NYC Metalcore/Post-Hardcore Fan meetup group

results.description:
Making a point to be more Physical in 2016, I am doing another Warrior Dash. It was great time in the past ones I took part in. So I decided to get some people together to share in the fun. Come on guys let's get physical. This will be a meet up for the 2016 Warrior Dash in NY on Saturday, MAY 21st. (Please join the group if you are interested in coming to this event only.)

Warrior Dash is the obstacle course race that anyone can start and everyone can finish. Whether you’re an elite athlete or just beginning the challenge, you’ll conquer 12 world-class obstacles, climb walls, wade across wooded lakes, hurtle fire and venture through mud-caked backroads as you make your loop to the finish line. You’ll be rewarded with a finisher medal, a sweet t-shirt, fuzzy Warrior helmet, and ice cold beer. Head to the post-race party to relive the course with friends, dance to live music, and celebrate your decision to leave your normal weekend in the mud.

We will us this group to figure out the detail of travel to the event, pre-event prepping and maybe some fun outfit ideas.
results.name: Let's Get Physical ~ Warrior Dash NY

results.description:
Created to focus on the spiritual and ethical development of the psychical, healing and intuitive arts, the aim of this group is to provide a safe environment for those of you wanting to embark on a path of spiritual, intuitive and psychical development, personal transformation and healing, and awaken to full awareness of your sacred nature.

If you want to learn how to develop your own intuition, embark on a journey of spiritual healing, develop your own healing ability and/or psychical abilities, expand your consciousness and creativity, this will be an inspiring group for you. We will meet twice a month to discuss philosophy, metaphysics, consciousness, and bigger picture issues and do exercises to develop your own intuitive and healing abilities and learn tools to help you on your way. This group will take a holistic approach to expanding consciousness, managing your energy and sensitivity, developing empathy and a heightened vibration and sense of service. You will also learn tools, such as working with color, flowers, symbols, reading auras--generally increasing your sensitivity and intuitive ability. This will be fun and informative evening open to all levels.

About me:

A published author and international and accredited medium, I grew up steeped in Celtic mysticism and spiritual traditions of Ireland. As a child, I was aware of and communicated with spirits and later developed an interest in theosophy, metaphysics, Eastern spiritual and healing practices and practiced Zen Buddhism for more than a decade.

As an adult, I have undergone intensive training in evidential mediumship, attunement, philosophy, and intuitive development at the Arthur Findlay College in London and am accredited in mediumship and spiritual healing by its governing body, the Spiritualist National Union. I have a Diploma in Grief and Bereavement Counseling and certification in basic counseling from the Institute of Counselling in Glasgow, UK. I studied various intuitive and energetic modalities at the Edgar Cayce Center in Virginia, and became a Reiki Master under the guidance of Rev. Joseph Shiels at the Journey Within Spiritualist National Union Church.

As a medium, I help the bereaved to find joy, upliftment, and healing through reconnecting with their loved ones in spirit, sometimes simply to hear that they love us and are close by and other times to help heal unresolved issues or painful experiences.

As an empath and intuitive, I can help to carry messages from your guides and loved ones who remain close by to help and guide you throughout your life. I can also attune to you energy to give you intuitive insights that empower you to resolve issues that may be causing you to feel stressed, distressed, or out of balance and regain harmony and vitality.

As a Spiritual Healer and Reiki Master, I work with healing guides to allow healing energy flow from their spirit to yours to help you find the stillness within and find the peace and tranquility to help mend your body, heart and mind.

As an inspirational writer and SNU accredited public speaker, I have a keen interest in philosophy, metaphysics, theosophy, spirituality, and psychology and strive to inform and educate people on twenty-first views of life and the afterlife. I am an avid reader of Swedenborg, Schopenhauer, Andrew Jackson Davis, Mme Blavatsky, and Carl Jung. I also devote some time to the study of scientific disciplines, including physics and biocentrism. I enjoy lively discussion on bigger picture issues and the meaning and purpose of life.

I am currently working on my second book, What is Life? As a former journalist, I continue to contribute feature articles about spirituality and wellness. I also teach teach mediumship, healing, intuitive development at the Edgar Cayce Center and the Celtic Spirit Center in Riverdale and online.
results.name: Riverdale Psychical & Intuitive Development

This group is for any parent who is interested in their child's math education. Whether your child is looking for an accelerated learning experience or to catch up from behind we will discuss technologies and techniques that can help students sharpen their mathematical skills and advance their thinking. I firmly believe that any kid can learn math with the right guidance and tools. A solid foundation in math can lead to a solid foundation for one's career. I work for a math education initiative based in Midtown, and I started this MeetUp to help parents who are both interested and invested in their child's math education. I've put together a pretty simple agenda for our first meetup. The structure will change as the group evolves: 

1. Discussion session to highlight the most common problems facing the group from a Math Ed standpoint. 2. Tips and resources for parents to use will be freely shared 

3. (First 3 meetups only) Snacks and (soft) Drinks!

Note: Absolutely no solicitation of any kind. Only accepting parents and parent-adjacents interested in Math Education for their children

About EggShell

Here at Columbia University, a good number of students has been working or planning to work on a start-up project.  However, they are also facing hardships -- the need for partners, mentors, venture capital financial supports and many more opportunities.

［蛋壳科技］ 是由一群充满激情的哥伦比亚大学留学生组建，为纽约地区学生提供前期专业指导，交流活动，创业机会，以及对接资源的非营利平台。我们的目标是在大纽约地区成功输出和启动最多的新兴创业计划。

在这个飞速发展的时代，各种资源都是非常重要的资本，也是成功的必要条件。而作为学生以及刚踏出社会的年轻人，最需要的也正是各种信息与资源。蛋壳科技正是发挥了桥梁的作用。我们定期举办的各项活动都将会邀请经验丰富的顾问导师以及风投资本为创业项目进行专业评估。如果受到赏识与肯定，便有机会得到资金以及各项支持，从而孵化成为完整的落地项目。

THEIR ARE GROUPS ON MEETUP PRETENDING TO BE THIS ONE. PLEASE BE AWARE AND I HAVE REPORTED IT TO MEETUP STAFF AS WELL. YES WE ARE THAT POPULAR THAT PPL WANT TO DUPLICATE OUR GROUP! LOL!

**ONLY A FEW SPOTS LEFT FOR MEMBERSHIP**

This group is for educated, fun, outgoing, positive ladies, age 21-40yrs old in New York City, who are looking to make long lasting friendships. Whether you recently moved to NYC or have lived here all of your life it doesn't matter.  We will hang in the city, grab a bite, shop til we drop, get our nails done, relax at the spa, grab a few drinks after work, travel on the weekends , and much more! 

**I will be very selective when accepting requests. Also, their is a limit on the # of ppl in this group. Meaning unlike many of the other meetups on here, DIC (divas in the city) will not have 200+ members. Having a small number of members will make getting to know each other a lot easier and form friendships**

Meetup events will include:

• Brunch

• Happy Hour

• Girls Night Out

• Dinner and Movies

• Wine Tasting

• Outdoor activities

• Cruises

• Museums

• Spa days

• Travel, Vacation, Weekend Getaways

• Shopping

• Fashion events (NYFW)

• Dancing (clubs, nightlife)

• Bars, hookah lounge

• Zumba, pole dancing classes lol (they are actually a lot of fun and the workout is great for every part of your body)

**NOTE: Not all meetups will be planned weeks in advanced. Some will be spontaneous/last minute.

This group doesn't have a lot of "rules". I only ask for 3 things from each member:

1) Attend meetups as much as possible. (Can't build friendships if you attend only once every 6 months lol)

2) Avoid the FLAKY syndrome. If you RSVP Yes please follow through with that. If your rsvp changes suddenly (it's life, things happen) please change the RSVP to No. Flakiness is not allowed and will result in immediate removal of your membership for this group. That's it! Inactivity will result in removal from the group.

3) Just be yourself! This group is a judgement free zone :)

Stay fabulous and I look forward to meeting you! xoxo

topics.name: Keeping Black Love Alive with Date Nights

results.description:
Ok, so yeah, a lot of people ask us, "What the heck is "Nhappi Hour??"

Basically, Nhappi Hour is a chip in the #blackLOVEmatters cookie.
It's our effort to improve the way we treat each other in Black-on-Black relationships.

By the bullet points, it's:

• An intimate open forum, where we talk about the real sh.. in a real grown way.

• A curated group conversation.

• An interactive experience.

• Activities & games

• Good music. Good company.

• A grown-er grown & sexy vibe.

• patronizing black business

Are you still curious?? Just come thru.

Why Nhappi Hour??

• To have the hard conversations in an easier way

• To curate community, one conversation at a time

• To create a different space to meet men/women

• To speak, listen, and share our voices and perspectives

• To party together, in a different way

•Still curious?? R.S.V.P, and just come thru.


The extended rundown:

Our "cocktails & conversations" type of event is a social collective of (mostly Black) men and women who meet up once per month, patronize a Black-owned lounge or venue (commit to spending at least $20), and have a curated conversation and exploration on a topic related to Black Love & Black sociocultural issues.

Nhappi Hour was created by 2 professional facilitators, who work consistently at the art of making conversation happen in our professional lives, and we just wanted to take it further. We decided to create a space for conversation about the state of BLACK LOVE and Black issues...but in a fun, interactive way. We are diligent about keeping the dialogue, energy and space, safe and sacred. We figured, "Hey, if we can cultivate conversations among teens, inmates, and other populations successfully, why not bridge the gap in communication in our immediate community, starting with Black men and women?"

So yeah,
Nhappi Hour is an interactive experience.
What does that mean?
It means, we don't JUST sit around and talk. We all participate in activities, games, and crafts that help keep the conversation going. So if you're looking to just be a voyeur... nahhh potna'. Interactive means, YOUR voice, YOUR participation, YOUR love, matters. So, lean IN to the experience.

Nhappi Hour is FILLED with drama. Literally.
We use short, entertaining skits/scenes/poetry/whateva...  performed by our facilitators to introduce the conversation, and to push to the dialogue forward.

Nhappi Hour is perfect for singles as a cool way to meet men and women in a low pressure, cool, interactive environment.
But, Nhappi Hour is beneficial for dating couples and married couples as well. Your perspective in a community dialogue is a great influence on bridging the gap in communication between men and women.
Nhappi hour is open to all adults, but our target demographic is mid-20-40's.
Our conversations center around Black Heterosexual relationships, but because we do discuss broader community/cultural issues as well, we understand that Black people of all sexual orientations can add value and perspective to the dialogue, as can folk of other races/cultures...and so, all are welcome.
We just wanna be transparent- our event will be focused on the Black heterosexual agenda so don't get it twisted.
We're clear, you should be, too.
But yeah,
Join the discussion.

NABE Harlem Downstairs (127th Street and Fred. Douglass Blvd) is our private meeting spot for the night of exciting activities and dialogue. Come thru and help us support this Black-owned business, by committing to spend at least $20. They have a full menu and full bar as well, so that should be easy (and you can always buy someone else a drink if youuuu don't drink...wink)

RSVP today. Limited Space Available (nah, seriously though, we have the space to ourselves but the location isn't huge, so space is limited to 40). (and Please update your rsvp to make space for someone else if you can't make it! We're taking rsvp's from 2 other groups as well)

Thanks for joining, and we look forward to seeing your beautiful faces in the places!

Follow us on Instagram @nhappihour 

and join our facebook group: facebook.com/groups/nhappihour
results.name: Nhappi Hour

results.description:
Hello New York City Event Planners!

Thank you for checking out our meet up! We are currently in the process of starting an Event Planning Expo business and we are currently seeking independent event planning businesses who will be willing to vendor for us. Whether you're already in business, just starting a business, or would like to promote it, all types are welcomed!

Planning a wedding or event these days can be a nightmare! Especially when you don't know where to find event planners. You would have to call businesses, have them come to your home or office at a time thats never convenient, find people online without visual aids, etc. The whole idea of this business will be where event planners of all kind can all come together, set up a table, showcase their business, reveal samples and visual aids, hand out business cards, meet clients face-to-face, sell stuff and book events, all at once! We would like this Event Planning Expo to take place at a park in the spring and summer time and at a hotel banquet hall in the fall and winter.

We are looking for the following:

-Photographers

-DJs

-Tent rentals

-Limousine rentals

-Caterers (Sample and sell your own food)

-Wedding Gown/Tuxedo fitters

-Wedding ring fitters

-Party Favor suppliers

-Novelty Concession Stands (popcorn, cotton candy, snow cone machines etc.)

-Ice Cream Trucks

-Wedding Cake Designers

-Ice Sculptures

-Florists

-Travel Agents

-Characters (Mascots, Clowns)

-Magicians

-Candy Buffet Suppliers

-Balloon Suppliers/Balloonists

-Animal show businesses

-Inflatable rentals

-Spray Paint Artists

...Anything Event Planning related!

Our goal for the Expos is to help other businesses promote their own, to make it convenient for people (guests who attend) to plan their own events with as little stress as possible and to also be a place where families and friends can come and have fun! The way you earn money is entirely up to you! Whether it's selling food, booking events with a down payment, selling bracelets for all day access to the moon bouncers for the kids, etc. We would like to hold meet ups at least once a month, so we will have more vendors at each Expo. Thank You for your time and we hope to see you at our meet ups!

Thank You for your time and we look forward to getting to know each and every one of you and hopefully have an opportunity to work with you all!
results.name: "Vend & Attend" - New York City Event Planning

results.description:
The Inner Engineering Meetup group offers free meditation classes, yoga programs, public events, and social gatherings where we can come together to practice, learn more, relax and have fun! 

We look forward to meeting you, soon! 

--------------

"If life were to come with a manual, this in my opinion would be it! If we all applied the Inner Engineering technology, our world would instantly transform to exist from a foundation of peace, joy, and compassion for all beings."  -Evita Ochel   

For all of the strides we have made in science and technology with standards of living unimaginable a century ago, most human beings still remain in search of wholeness and purpose in their lives.  Inner Engineering is scientifically-structured to offer powerful processes from the ancient tradition of yoga to transcend the limitations of who you are and bring you to higher levels of consciousness.  Inner Engineering was designed by Sadhguru, a yogi, visionary, and one the foremost authorities on yoga as a powerful tool to create your life the way you want it.  

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hUeyqLTsGJs

Sadhguru & Deepak Chopra— Creating Inner Peace, Joy and Fulfillment in a Hectic Modern World 

"The word 'yoga' means union, that means you experience the entire universe as yourself...by working with the body, by working with the mind, by working with your emotion and energy, you can setup a step-by- step system within yourself where your energies are kept at such a level of exuberance that your sensory body is as large as the universe...Once you experience everybody around you as yourself... your goodness is a consequence, not an effort."

https://youtu.be/WMhJgdpj1d0

About Sadhguru—Sadhguru is a realized yogi and mystic – a man whose passion spills into everything he encounters. With a keen mind, balanced by a heart that knows no boundary, his presence and powerful yoga programs create an extraordinary opportunity to break through limitations into one’s natural state of freedom, love and joy. 

Sadhguru has a unique ability to make the ancient science of yoga relevant to contemporary minds. Sadhguru serves as a bridge to the deeper dimensions of life. His approach does not ascribe to any belief system, but offers methods for self-transformation that are both proven and powerful.

An author, poet and internationally renowned speaker, Sadhguru’s wit and piercing logic provoke and broaden our thoughts and perception of the meaning of life, the very purpose of life. Sadhguru has been an influential voice at major global forums including the UN, MIT, TED, and the World Economic Forum.

Sadhguru established Isha Foundation, a non-profit organization supported by over two million volunteers worldwide. From powerful yoga programs and meditation practices to large-scale humanitarian projects, the foundation’s activities are designed to create an inclusive culture and establish global harmony, earning a special consultative status with the United Nations.

------------------ 

Isha Kriya Guided Meditation—Jump Right In... Learn to Meditate NOW! 

These 1-hour guided meditation sessions offer a simple, but powerful kriya practice that aligns your mind, body, and inner-energies to elevate your conscious awareness and easily and naturally achieve a state of deep meditation. Once you are meditative on a daily basis, your experience of the life within you and the world around you becomes much richer. Daily meditation makes your life stress-free, effortless and joyful! 

You can easily learn this 12-to-18 minute Isha Kriya process in a convenient, online meditation class, or through a live, free meditation class near you.  Our online formats include our streaming guided meditation video, the Isha Kriya meditation app (for iphone & android devices), and weekly webinars hosted by trained teachers who can answer your questions about the practice.  Local meditation sessions are hosted regularly to enhance and deepen the experience with the group. 

Benefits of regular Isha Kriya meditation practice include improving health, energy and vitality; enhancing mental focus, memory and clarity; reducing stress and establishing a deep sense of peace and inner balance. 

Isha Kriya is a simple, gentle guided meditation that can be done seated cross-legged on the floor or sitting in a chair. No previous experience with yoga or meditation  is necessary.

https://youtu.be/q8NYZdYd5GQ

Take a  Deeper Step with Inner Engineering: Create a Life of Total Wellbeing—

“Inner Engineering is neither a religion, nor a philosophy or dogma. It is a technology for wellbeing. One does not have to believe or disbelieve--just have to learn to use...  Technology will produce results irrespective of who you are.” –Sadhguru  

Inner Engineering is a 7-session online course that gives you the opportunity to intellectually explore the ABC’s of life using methods that are the distilled essence of yogic sciences. The course imparts practical wisdom to manage your body, mind, emotions, and the fundamental life energy within. 

Program components include:

• Enlightening interactive sessions

• Guided meditations

• Asanas, simple yoga postures.

• Shambhavi Mahamudra, a powerful , 21-minute inner-energy technique that brings your entire system into alignment so that your body, mind, emotions and energies function in harmony.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=ooFAmT4n89Y

**Live Reviews from Inner Engineering Participants ** 

------------------

A Serene Mountain Getaway to Learn Classical Yoga:  Relax and rejuvenate at the Isha yoga retreat—

The Isha Institute of Inner-sciences is a breathtaking mountain retreat for stress relief, rejuvenation, and complete inner well-being. The yoga retreat offers the ancient science in its purest form, through experiential classical yoga, meditation classes, and powerfully energized meditation spaces such as the Adi Yogi: The Abode of Yoga.  

The Isha Institute of Inner-sciences is a world-class yoga center offering classical yoga and meditation classes from beginner to advanced levels. Guests journey from around the globe to visit this unique destination to relax, reflect, and reconnect with nature in this tranquil oasis nestled in Tennessee’s spectacular Upper Cumberland. 

https://youtu.be/RpXEcB5uhZc

Drop-by for a Day Visit

The Isha retreat center offers campus tours daily that include light hikes to one of many beautiful bluff vistas or waterfalls and a visit inside Mahima, the largest yoga and meditation hall in the western hemisphere! Several free yoga classes and guided meditation sessions are available each day.  Inquire with the main office for details.

Hiking and Mountain Biking on Pristine Forested Trails

The Isha retreat center also offers myriad opportunities for hiking and mountain biking on forested trails winding throughout nearly 1400 acres. The center's five miles of mountain biking trails have been professionally classified from beginner to intermediate skill levels, with steep climbs, water features, and tight switchbacks on the more challenging portions. The trails are part of an expanding network of over 15 miles of hiking and biking trails featuring beautiful waterfalls, a meandering spring-fed creek, and breathtaking bluff overlooks.

Relaxation & Wellness Retreats

Overnight stays include the option of private studio accommodations, delicious vegetarian buffet, and beginner-level yoga classes of the visitor`s choice, such as the 'yoga of sound', yoga for strengthening the joints, and yoga for purifying life energies.  Extended retreat packages feature Ayurvedic rejuvenation consultations and therapies; guided hikes and adventure outings to nearby caves, rivers and falls; free access to over 5 miles of mountain biking trails, and even cooking classes to bring home some of your favorite vegetarian delights!  Learn how to mix the pungent, tangy spices of the East, culture farm-fresh milk into yogurt, roll vegetarian sushi, or bake homemade sourdough bread in the Isha center's popular, international kitchen.

For over 30 years, Isha programs have offered the immense benefits of classical yoga and meditation to over 7 million people around the globe. For further details on the Isha yoga retreat center, the Isha Institute of Inner-sciences, and full details on the yoga and meditation programs offered, visit IshaUSA.org.

Visit us online...

IshaUSA Blog: http://www.ishafoundation.org/us/blog/ 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/InnerEngineering  ; https://www.facebook.com/IshaUSA/ 
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/IshaUSA 
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/IshaInnerEngineering

results.description:
This group is all about mechanical keyboards!

Who should join:

Mech enthusiast. If you spend your day on /r/MechanicalKeyboards, if you spend half your salary on the next batch of Granit Keycaps, if you're building your own Ergodox - join us and share your passion.

If you're new to MK, overwhelm with all the nuances and can't chose which switch to chose, what profile of keycaps will be most comfortable, where to buy, what bran or what model - this is the place to meet experts and get some hands-on with all the clicky gadgets that will float around.

Our meetings:

We will aim to meet once a month or two months.  Our meeting are like a mechanical keyboards fair.  Members will bring their beloved boards (and laptops), and let other members try them out.  Each of us will have a chance to show(case\off) their keyboards and special customizations. Everybody will be able to try out all this goodness, and get better understanding on all the different models, feature and capabilities.

We also have discussions and learning sessions, where members can talk about different aspects of MKs. 

Lastly, this is a good place to trade (as well as sell\buy) keyboards. So let the group know in advance what you're looking for, so people will know in advance and can bring the relevant boards (those of us with lots and lots of them...).

Other information:

This is meant to be a members' led group. It means that:

1. Anyone can initiate a meeting.

2. Co-hosts positions are open, so feel free to apply yourself.

3. Space to meet - if you have a space where we can hold our meeting - we'll be happy to hear about it.
results.name: Click-Clack - Mechanical Keyboard

This is not only a meetup group, but it is an upcoming organization that helps women in NYC to live a happy & spiritual lifestyle. This organization will collaborate with several companies and charities to help human welfare. **If you're a woman who love fashion, spiritual and motivated to obtain a healthy positive lifestyle, then this group is for you******

Calling all Fashionistas Women ages (21-40). Only calling positive energy to the circle. This group will encourage you to be the better "You". Finding inner peace and being happy in the moment. Finding motivation to just improve your self and achieving your goals.

This group will be a Safe space to discuss your concerns or just to share your ideas on a certain topic. This is a group that will embrace your creativity, your inner spirit, finding balance and creating a lifestyle that is wholesome, healthy, spiritual and happy.

This circle is judgement free, no drama or negative energy.

Here are some activities we will do:

- Life Empowerment Workshops - (Achieve your dreams & goals)

-Book Club (Self-Help Books that will benefit your Life)

- Volunteer Work (Emergency Disasters, Homeless population, Meal Service etc.)

-Fashionista Brunch/Dinners: Let’s eat & have Spiritual Talk Examples of discussion are: (Self-development, are we really growing and using our strengths what are we doing to develop it. Views on religion, what is your philosophy in life, celibacy & healthy dating, marriage, temptations we encounter, sharing personal stories where god answered your prayer, financial planning, discussing our goals & daily struggles in life etc.)

-Spiritual Meetings (Discussion on the supreme being)

- Yoga/Meditation/ Chakra Energy Cleansing Work Shops (Cleanse your aura)

- Fashion Show (Events geared toward empowering self image or charity)

- Spa/Sauna/ Reflexology (Heal the soul & revitalize for the week ahead)

***Most of the events will be a maximum of Six members only. I feel when it's a large group of women, its not intimate and we dont get the opportunity to really know each other. So please make sure you RSVP for the events or add your name to the waiting list***

By the way If you RSVP please keep me updated if your not going to attend the event. Respect is very important to the other group members so if there is a No Show, your automatically removed from the group.

results.description:
RIFFSLINGER ARTIST COLLECTIVE - NEW YORK, NY

RIFFSLINGER supports and promotes the creative endeavors of artists, with the aim of fostering a community of like-minded individuals who have a passion for creativity and a desire to expand their network.

Originally headquartered in New York City, RIFFSLINGER is now expanding west, and currently has Artist Collectives in Portland, Oregon and Los Angeles, California. The purpose of this collective is to gather with artists of various expertise, get to know each other, and find out more about what projects everyone is working on. We hope that fellow artists will provide recommendations and feedback that will help you progress with your project, and possibly offer to help promote your work, or even collaborate with you to make it a success.

If you love Paris and France, but do not (yet) speak French, this is the place for you. And if you speak French? Of course you are welcome too! 

We'll get together in nice, conversational friendly places where we'll have a good table and share a bottle of wine along with our stories about the place so close to our hearts. 

From these stories will come get togethers varied to the different backgrounds and aims of our members, such as French language, Paris travel planning, and French food.

Throughout, we’ll always gather everyone back together for ever-changing connections and conversations because after all, at our table, we're all French at heart.

Oscar Wilde wrote that “when good Americans die, they go to Paris". This will be the table on our way from New York to Paris, and for those who wish, from English to French!

results.description:
Welcome to Radiate Mastermind, a support group for women seeking momentum and joy. In each meeting we fire up a discussion to explore your truest self in a safe, encouraging atmosphere and offer a self-reflective exercise for harnessing inner wisdom. If you’re ready to hear and be heard by an awesome group of women, recharge your battery pack, and break all glass ceilings, then this is your time to RADIATE. 

Napoleon Hill outlined the mastermind principle beautifully in his book, “Think and Grow Rich”. He speaks of the group as a collection of energy--each one of us carries our own battery pack, but together, we increase our voltage and can bring more light into our lives and the world (through connecting with each other in an authentic way)!

Many groups exist for networking purposes, particularly when it involves business, but Radiate Mastermind is not just about your business--it’s about the business of living. We are, each of us, seeking our own path and doing the best we can to “stay true” to the path. Sometimes it gets dark, sometimes it gets overgrown, and sometimes it gets dark and overgrown all at once! Your Radiate Mastermind does not dispel the darkness, or even clear the path for you...your group simply stands with you in the dark amidst the brush, reminding you that you are not alone and that you have everything you need to forge ahead--to shine the only way that your star shines.

WHO IT IS FOR:
Women who want to generate more joy effortlessly through a group dynamic
Women who are ready to experience breakthroughs and focus on the gratitude of living
Women who desire to be heard by others, free of judgement
Women who want to commit to self-care and learn how to receive from each other and themselves

Radiate is led by Brittany Barton and Carolyn Agis. They are community builders and have been leading mastermind groups amongst their many healing circles.
results.name: Women's Support Group: RADIATE Mastermind

topics.name: Singles Who Love to Travel Travel

results.description:
Are you a teacher or other school professional on a teaching schedule? Is travel one of your passions? Do you get frustrated about the costs of travel during teacher breaks or about finding travel partners? Teachers (and School Professionals Travel) is can help.

This is a forum for finding travel opportunities and partners that work with YOUR schedule. As school professionals we are limited in WHEN we can travel (summers, winter break, spring break, Christmas break), but have ample travel time. We also know that prices during the times that we travel are at their highest.

In addition to travel opportunities, we will also host Meet Up events to brainstorm travel ideas, attend travel shows and explore international cuisine and cultures in and around NYC. Additional costs may be required to reserve a spot for these events.

Membership:

To join, answer a few simple questions. Once your membership is approved, you will receive a notification with a link to pay the non-refundable $23.98 annual membership dues. Dues are collected to offset the cost of maintaining the Meet Up.

Once your membership request is approved, you will have a 14 day trial to decide whether the group is right for you. If at the conclusion of the trial period, the membership fee is unpaid, you will be automatically dropped from the group. With your paid membership, you will be able to post requests for travel partners for trips that you already have planned, collaborate with other members to plan new trips, and access the group’s closed (private) Facebook page where you can post photos and reviews from your travels.

*****Please be sure to review the group rules before submitting your request to make sure the group is a good fit.*****

Group Rules:

1. To be considered for membership, you must have a profile with a photo of yourself. While I love puppies, kittens and avatars, this is a group for people to connect, so a photo is a must.

2. To be considered for membership, three questions must be answered in detail (i.e., name the specific countries or cities that you have traveled to).

3. The Meet Up cannot be used to sell your product/service directly to members, or used to solicit members via Meet Up messaging. If a member reports being solicited, you will be immediately removed from the group.

4. All posts are moderated by the organizer who reserves the right to delete posts that are unrelated to the group’s purpose, offensive, or otherwise inappropriate.

5. Be nice. Be nice. Be nice. As digital communication can sometimes be misinterpreted, please be thoughtful and considerate when posting to the group.

<br>
results.name: Teachers (and School Professionals) Travel

results.description:
Hello, fellow gamers! Do you enjoy playing DOTA 2 and would love to play with a regular group of people? At the same time, are you also turned off by the often immature and toxic behavior in the community and want to game with some genuinely nice and civil people? Then this free group for adult gamers (18+) is perfect for you! Imagine playing DOTA 2 with kind and supportive adult teammates!... Meeting fellow gamers in person in a comfortable and public setting helps makes this possible. We also link up online and game together from the comfort of our own homes. Part of the reason why players in pubs keep resorting to using the same small group of hard carries is because there is rarely the positive space, communication and teamwork needed to play a crucial support role. When ALL 111 heroes become usable, this game breaks wide open! 5 people and Skype makes for an awesome time :)


There are only 3 rules for our group:

1) 2 no-shows (online or in-person) and you will be gently removed from the group. If you need to cancel, that is always ok if you give us advance notice. This is for fun, not a part-time job. Just please cancel before the Event actually starts!

2) Any trolling or unsolicited criticism and you will be gently removed from the group. There is no secret "Report" system with this group. If people are abusive over chat, they would end up getting banned. It is a somewhat strict rule but it creates a more effective and fun team when we have a safe and happy space to play. Strategizing before or after the match (“Maybe you could buy Boots of Travel before Assault Cuirass?” / “We should not trilane with this hero.”) is much more effective in improving skill level than blaming others during the match. All levels of play are welcome, so we will naturally settle into groups of 5 that have similar playstyles and skill.

3) Inactive (not attending any online or in-person Events) for more than 3 months (90 days) and you will be gently removed from the group.


See you soon!
results.name: Uplifting DOTA 2! [UD2]
